problem_statement: Build a color palette web application using Next.js 14 App Router with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS that allows designers to generate harmonious palettes via Colord, extract colors from images with nodeâ€‘vibrant, and manually create palettes with a color picker. Implement MongoDB/Mongoose for data persistence, NextAuth.js for authentication, and provide organization via collections/tags, format exports (CSS, Tailwind, JSON, PNG via html2canvas), and a community gallery. The tool must support robust palette management, public sharing, and efficient search while delivering a smooth, professional design workflow.
